section.p: This chapter contains information about the various monsters and NPCs the characters might encounter.

descriptions.description: The creature is an animal without a great deal of intellect. Driven by hunger, fear, protection of its young.

The creature is an extra planar creature from the demon realms. This creatures primary goals are to escape from the demon realms and to reap vengence on those who have not suffered as they have. The creatures intellect varies from mindlessness hunger to cold hard genius.
This creature hails from the raw elemental plains.
Creatures who originate from other planes of existance.
Fey creatures are from the Wyld.
Humans are the dominant race in the game.
The Jötunn are one a group of giant varieties that hail from the Jötunheimr plane that borders our plane the closest in the lands to the north.
Mooks are monsters that go down easy. Any boon that hits, kills a mook instantly.

The monster is important to the story. Critical successes will not instantly kill them. These monsters can reroll checks to escape or die at the GMs discretion. Rerolls are made with the addition of the ability rank on top of any other modifiers. This does not mean the monster is unkillable, just harder to kill. This protection lasts until such time as the GM deems it is dramatically appropriate for the monster to die.

This monster is actually a swarm of small individuals acting as one. Most weapons do only one point of damage. Crushing weapons do half damage. Area of effect attacks do maximum damage against a swarm.
